pack.tacz.atea.name: ATEA
pack.tacz.atea.desc: AstralLin's Tactical Expansion Accessory for Timeless and Classics Guns Zero. Praise the pioneers, respect the companions, and be grateful to the followers.
atea.ammo.0950x38.name: §e.366 TKM Bullet (Birdshot No.10)
atea.ammo.0950x38.desc:
The civilian cartridge produced by Tekhkrim, 
based on 7.62x39mm and fits the AKM magazines, 
offering an rifle option for Russian civilian.
atea.ammo.1163x39.name: §b.458 HAM'R Bullet
atea.ammo.1163x39.desc:
The powerful cartridge produced by Wilson Comabt, 
fits the AR-15 sized magazine, 
is similar to .458 SOCOM by Teppo Jutsu, 
specialized to operate at higher pressure, 
offering an increased range in a flatter trajectory.
atea.gun.ltlm2.name: Safran - Optic 1 & E&D & Vectronix | LTLMⅡ (Guiding Support: Single shot of XM1155-SC HVP, by M1299 155mm Howitzer)
atea.gun.ltlm2.desc:
It could provide the soldier a system with higher performance, 
greater reliability and less complexity than legacy products.
atea.gun.mdx2.name: Maxim Defense | PDX-SD SBR
atea.gun.mdx2.desc:
An excellent Personal Defense Weapon that encapsulates 
power, portability, and quietness in a very 
compact form without sacrificing performance.
atea.gun.mdx2s.name: Maxim Defense | PDX Civ Pistol
atea.gun.mdx2s.desc:
YES, IT IS A PISTOL (ATF). 
No OEM buttstock and vertical foregrip.
atea.gun.mdx4.name: Maxim Defense | SDX-508 SBR
atea.gun.mdx4.desc: Strict size requirements for suppressed firearm.
atea.gun.mdx5.name: Maxim Defense | MDX-510 SBR
atea.gun.mdx5.desc: Balance between direct length and ammunition.
atea.gun.mdxu.name: §eMaxim Defense | MDX Custom AR
atea.gun.mdxu.desc:
.458 HAM'R Caliber 20 inch barrel.
Powerful and Tacticool.
atea.gun.glock20g5mos.name: Glock | 20 Gen5 MOS Pistol
atea.gun.glock40g4mos.name: Glock | 40 Gen4 MOS Pistol
atea.gun.ots33.name: KBP | OTs-33 Pernach Machine Pistol
atea.attachment.shield_vantvm.name: §eFORT | Vant-VM Shield
atea.attachment.shield_vantvm.desc:
The main body is a shield capable of NIJ Ⅲ, 
with an observation window, additional undercarriage and flash light set, 
and the center of the fabric is dyed red to attract attention.
atea.attachment.bayonet_6kh2.name: §4Tula | «6Kh2» 1955 Bayonet
atea.attachment.bayonet_6kh2.desc:
The earliest bayonet that can be traced back to the AK family, 
evolved from the SKS sword-shaped bayonet.
atea.attachment.bayonet_6kh4.name: §4Izhevsk | «6Kh4» 1972 Bayonet
atea.attachment.bayonet_6kh4.desc:
The structure is simpler and the weight is lighter, 
but it retains the functions of a multi-functional bayonet 
and can be used as a wire cutter when used with the scabbard.
atea.attachment.bayonet_6kh5.name: §4Izhmash | «6Kh5» 1991 Bayonet
atea.attachment.bayonet_6kh5.desc:
The handle has anti slip protrusions, 
which are more ergonomic and can be used as a dagger, 
the 1991 model year has returned with a fixed hole for the scabbard.
atea.attachment.bayonet_6kh9.name: §4KAMPO | ShN-2 «6Kh9-1» Bayonet
atea.attachment.bayonet_sks_blade.name: §4Tula | SKS-45 Blade Bayonet
atea.attachment.bayonet_sks_blade.desc:
It continues the classic bayonet style with a long straight blade, 
which can be folded when not in use.
atea.attachment.buttstock_pt1.name: §4Zenit | PT-1 Telescopic Buttstock
atea.attachment.buttstock_pt1.desc:
Made of steel milling, with a skeleton style, adjustable cheek pad, foldable and stretchable, 
it is a classic among AK modified products.
atea.attachment.buttstock_pt1s.name: §4Zenit | PT-1S Telescopic Buttstock (Extended)
atea.attachment.buttstock_pt1s.desc: Longer than PT-1 while maintaining functionality, and able to extend further.
atea.attachment.buttstock_pt3.name: §4Zenit | PT-3 Telescopic Buttstock
atea.attachment.buttstock_pt3.desc:
The tubular body is equipped with large rubber shoulder pads and cheek pads, 
making it lighter and more comfortable.
atea.attachment.buttstock_pt3s.name: §4Zenit | PT-3S Telescopic Buttstock (Extended)
atea.attachment.buttstock_pt3s.desc: Longer than PT-3 while maintaining functionality, and able to extend further.
atea.attachment.buttstock_zhukovs.name: §4Magpul | Zhukov-S Buttstock
atea.attachment.buttstock_zhukovs.desc: The no-compromise folding stock for the modern AK.
atea.attachment.buttstock_cobra.name: §eFAB Defense | Cobra Foldable Buttstock
atea.attachment.buttstock_ambidextrous.d:
Feature an integrated hinge that can be configured to 
allow the stock to fold to either the right or left.
atea.attachment.buttstock_mxm_cqb7.name: §eMaxim Defense | CQB GEN:7 Buttstock (Extended)
atea.attachment.buttstock_mxm_cqb7.desc: Adopting a hollow structure, it is very lightweight.
atea.attachment.buttstock_mxm_scw.name: §eMaxim Defense | SCW Buttstock
atea.attachment.buttstock_mxm_scw.desc: Meet stringent requirements for the full length of compact weapons.
Heckler & Koch HK416C OEM AR-Type butt kit.
Due to the shorter buffer tube and stronger spring,
firerate is higher, and the rear recoil is also more noticeable.
atea.attachment.buttstock_416c_expand.de:
Heckler & Koch HK416C OEM AR-Type butt kit.
Due to the shorter buffer tube and stronger spring,
firerate is higher, and the rear recoil is also more noticeable.
atea.attachment.buttstock_crab.name: TACCOM | Cheek Riser Adjustable Buttstock
atea.attachment.buttstock_crab.desc:
one of the most adjustable buttstocks on the market today 
for your AR-15 typical buffer tube, pretty tacticool.
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_mfs.name: §eStrike Industries | MFS Buttstock with Monopod
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_mfs.desc:
Combine the versatility and adjustability of a collapsible stock 
with the strength, ergonomics, and solid fit of a fixed stock.
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_pita.name: §eStrike Industries | Pit Aluminum Buttstock (Mounted on: ARE-T7)
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_pita.desc:
It's time to reject the status quo, the compromises taken for what is, 
rather than think about what can be. 
Here is the solution.
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_pitp.name: §eStrike Industries | Pit Polymer Buttstock (Mounted on: ARE-T7)
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_pitp.desc:
The evolution of the aluminum version equally high-strength but lighter, 
while providing superior functionality.
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_viper1.name: Strike Industries | MOD1 Buttstock
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_viper1.desc:
Integrate features sought by military professionals and firearms enthusiasts: 
lighter, compact, even more attractive price.
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_viper2.name: Strike Industries | MOD2 Buttstock
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_viper2.desc:
With a wider cheek rest and overmolded buttstock pad, 
really dig into shoulders to shoot more comfortably and stably.
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_viper2f.nam: Strike Industries | MOD2 Buttstock with Additional Frame
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_viper2f.des:
Added a reinforcement frame to align it with conventional stock positioning, 
achieving the best balance between durability, stability, and comfort.
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_viperpdw.de:
It allows for effortless maneuverability particularly at the compressed position, 
with the press of a button, the rapid deployment system instantly springs 
to the extended position for greater shot stability and faster reaction time.
atea.attachment.buttstock_si_viperpdws.d:
It allows for effortless maneuverability particularly at the compressed position, 
with the press of a button, the rapid deployment system instantly springs 
to the extended position for greater shot stability and faster reaction time.
atea.attachment.grip_sf900a.name: Surefire | M900A Vertical Foregrip Weaponlight
atea.attachment.grip_sf900a.desc:
This integrated weapon light is a perfect compromise for 
those who are needing a pressure pad without sacrificing any grip on their gun.
Unfortunately, it is currently unable to function.
Mounted on: A.R.M.S. Throw-Lever
atea.attachment.grip_shift.name: Fortis | Shift Foregrip
atea.attachment.grip_shift.desc:
The hybrid design allows to use it as a full-on grip or as a comfortable hand stop 
when going with the thumb over method.
atea.attachment.grip_shiftshort.name: Fortis | Shift Short Foregrip
atea.attachment.grip_shiftshort.desc:
It is a hybrid of sorts. 
The shape works as a comfortable hand stop 
when going with the thumb over method.
atea.attachment.grip_vector.name: Kriss | Vertical Foregrip with Intergrated Finger Stop
atea.attachment.grip_vector.desc:
The short and chubby oval shaped grip combined with a small hand stop, 
and its length exactly the same as the original Vector lower rail.
atea.attachment.grip_zolfaqar_gc.name: DIO | Zolfaqar Combo Foregrips
atea.attachment.grip_zolfaqar_gc.desc:
Designed for the Zolfaqar rifle, 
taking into account various grip requirements, 
providing a fairly stable grip posture.
atea.attachment.grip_zolfaqar_gh.name: DIO | Zolfaqar Angled Grip
atea.attachment.grip_zolfaqar_gh.desc:
Designed for the Zolfaqar rifle, 
integrating the angled grip with the hand stop 
provides excellent handling.
atea.attachment.grip_zolfaqar_gp.name: DIO | Zolfaqar Gripod
atea.attachment.grip_zolfaqar_gp.desc:
Designed for the Zolfaqar rifle, 
integrating the vertical grip with the bipod 
provides excellent stability.
atea.attachment.laser_dbald2.name: Steiner | DBAL-D2 Laser Sight
atea.attachment.laser_dbald2.desc: Manufactured with high definition, aspherical telescopic lens technology, the DBAL-D2 features a 2° to 30° adjustable illumination beam. This highly collimated beam significantly enhances night vision performance and offers an eye-safe means of illuminating distances greater than 1000 m.
atea.attachment.laser_ogl.name: §3EOTech | OGL Laser Sight
atea.attachment.laser_ogl.desc:
Focus on human performance factors under extreme stress 
creating the premium choice for professional users.
atea.attachment.muzzle_fd917.name: §eFischer Development | FD917 Suppressor
atea.attachment.muzzle_fd917.desc:
Attachment simplified to only one click, short and handy size, accuracy. 
Technical sophistcation down to the smallest detail.
atea.attachment.muzzle_fd919.name: §eFischer Development | FD919 Suppressor
atea.attachment.muzzle_fd919.desc:
Attachment simplified to only one click, short and handy size, accuracy. 
Technical sophistcation down to the smallest detail.
atea.attachment.muzzle_hybrid46m.name: Silencer Co. | Hybrid-46M Multi-Caliber Suppressor (Extended)
atea.attachment.muzzle_hybrid46m.desc:
One of the first modular large bore suppressors 
give the versatility of caliber and firearm platforms 
while adding the freedom of varying lengths.
atea.attachment.muzzle_mxm_dskm.name: Maxim Defense | DSK-M Suppressor
atea.attachment.muzzle_mxm_dskm.desc:
The built-in silencer, with its impressive outer diameter of 2.25 inches, 
significantly reduces noise and gas emissions, 
making this weapon stealthier and more comfortable to operate.
atea.attachment.muzzle_mxm_dsxm.name: Maxim Defense | DSX-M Suppressor
atea.attachment.muzzle_mxm_dsxm.desc: Just set the standard for extreme-duty use silencers.
atea.attachment.muzzle_mxm_hb.name: Maxim Defense | Hatebrake Muzzle Booster
atea.attachment.muzzle_mxm_hb.desc:
It is designed to regulate firearm exhaust gases to 
ensure PDW's cycle more reliably, and decrease the flash signature, 
as well as significantly reduce recoil.
atea.attachment.muzzle_omega300.name: Silencer Co. | Omega-300 DTM Suppressor
atea.attachment.muzzle_omega300.desc: A full-auto and magnum rated silencer ideal for rifle owners and avid outdoorsmen.
atea.attachment.muzzle_osprey45.name: Silencer Co. | Osprey-45 1.0 Suppressor
atea.attachment.muzzle_osprey45.desc:
fixed with a lever, it adopts a unique octagonal square box design with a center offset, 
allowing the pistol to be aimed using the original sights.
atea.attachment.muzzle_osprey9.name: Silencer Co. | Osprey-9 2.0 Suppressor
atea.attachment.muzzle_osprey9.desc:
2.0 utilizes a push button locking system for quick indexing. 
The monocore baffle design in a polygonal package allows for greater internal volume 
and therefore better sound performance.
atea.attachment.muzzle_salvo12.name: Silencer Co. | Salvo-12 Suppressor (Maximum Length)
atea.attachment.muzzle_salvo12.desc:
It is so modular that can be customized to 
keep a balance in sound, weight, and length 
by adding or removing any section.
atea.attachment.muzzle_si_cc.name: Strike Industries | Cookie Cutter Compensator
atea.attachment.muzzle_si_cc.desc:
It does have large reflecting area to enlarge great "reaction" to eliminate recoil force 
so that here will be significant side concussion. 
Additionally it also happens to make a great glass breaker!
atea.attachment.muzzle_si_md.name: §eStrike Industries | Mass Driver Compensator
atea.attachment.muzzle_si_md.desc:
It is driven by the hot gasses expelled through the barrel after the round is discharged, 
and acts as a counter balance system to attenuate mechanical recoil.
atea.attachment.muzzle_si_opp.name: Strike Industries | Oppressor Concussion Reduction Device
atea.attachment.muzzle_si_opp.desc: Designed with computer aided flow dynamics, the SI Oppressor provides a no compromise solution for redirecting the overpressure produced by aggressive brakes and compensators. Advanced internal geometry actively draws the gasses out and thrusts the gasses forward through vents to accomplish linear braking in order to retain more braking efficiency.
atea.attachment.muzzle_si_oppl.name: Strike Industries | Oppressor Lite Blast Shield
atea.attachment.muzzle_si_oppl.desc: Not only does LITE refer to the reduced weight, the design of the attachment mechanism has been made to be easier and quicker to install when removing without the ratcheting system like big brother.
atea.attachment.muzzle_si_oppu.name: Strike Industries | Oppressor Universal Blast Shield
atea.attachment.muzzle_si_oppu.desc: Advanced internal geometry actively draws the gasses out and thrusts the gasses forward through ports to accomplish linear braking in order to retain more efficiency.
atea.attachment.muzzle_ultra50.name: Thunder Beast Armament Co. | Ultra-50 Suppressor
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector06.name: §eKriss | Vector 6.5" Barrel & MK5M Handguard
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector06.desc:
The little one in the Vector factory kit only has one full-size length MLOK, 
with an additional extended barrel that matches the length.
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector10.name: §eKriss | Vector 10" Barrel & MK9 Handguard
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector10.desc:
One of the Vector factory kits, featuring nearly two full-size length MLOK, 
with an additional extended barrel that matches the length.
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector12.name: §eKriss | Vector 12" Barrel & MK11 Handguard
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector12.desc:
One of the Vector factory kits, featuring nearly three full-size length MLOK, 
with an additional extended barrel that matches the length.
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector14.name: §eKriss | Vector 14" Barrel & MK3 Handguard
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector14.desc:
One of the Vector factory kits, featuring many full-size MLOK, 
with an additional extended barrel that matches the length.
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector16.name: §eKriss | Vector CRB 16" Barrel and Shroud & MK1 Handguard
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector16.desc:
One of the Vector factory kits, featuring large heat dissipation holes, 
although it looks like a suppressor is installed, 
it is actually just a decoration.
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector18.name: §eKriss | Vector CRB Canadian 18.6" Barrel and Shroud
atea.attachment.muzzle_vector18.desc:
The big guy in the Vector factory kit, although it looks like a silencer, 
is actually just a decoration that can unparalleled meet regulatory legal requirements.
atea.attachment.sight_1p87_1p90.name: §5JSC Jupiter - Valdai | «1P87» PK-120 Holographic Sight & «1P90» ZT-410 3X Magnifier
atea.attachment.sight_compm2.name: §9Aimpoint | M68 CCO CompM2 Reflex Sight (Mounted on: Aimpoint | Gooseneck)
atea.attachment.sight_eotech_eflx.name: §fEOTech | EFLX Mini Red Dot Sight
atea.attachment.sight_eotech_eflx.desc:
The best red dot pistol sight available on the market, 
meeting the demands of any serious shooter.
atea.attachment.sight_eotech_eflx_pica.d:
The best red dot pistol sight available on the market, 
meeting the demands of any serious shooter.
atea.attachment.sight_eotech_eflx_scorpi:
The Universal Reflex Mount for GLOCK. 
It has one of the lowest bore axises in the industry without the hassle and cost of cutting your slide.
Mounted on: Strike Industries | G-SURF
atea.attachment.sight_eotech_hhs5_ogl_ft:
EXPS3-4 Holographic Sight & G45 5x Magnifier 
(Mounted on: Unity & GBRS | FAST FTC 291 OMNI, GBRS | Hydra for EOTech) 
This ensemble is ideally suited for both Close-Quarters Combat and engaging distant targets.
§3EOTech | HHS-Ⅴ & OGL Combo Sights (Magnifier Switched and Aiming by Laser)

EXPS3-4 Holographic Sight & G45 5x Magnifier 
(Mounted on: Unity & GBRS | FAST FTC 291 OMNI, GBRS | Hydra for EOTech) 
All while maintaining superior situational awareness.

EXPS3-4 Holographic Sight & G45 5x Magnifier 
(Mounted on: Unity & GBRS | FAST FTC 291 OMNI, GBRS | Hydra for EOTech) 
An excellent choice for professionals offers true two eyes open shooting for fast target acquisition.
atea.attachment.sight_eotech_hhs6_hdl.de:
EXPS3-2 Holographic Sight & G43 3x Magnifier 
(Mounted on: EOTech | STS; Leatherwood | AR-15/M16 Scope Mount) 
This ensemble is ideally suited for both Close-Quarters Combat and engaging distant targets.
atea.attachment.sight_eotech_hhs6_hdl_no:
EXPS3-2 Holographic Sight & G43 3x Magnifier 
(Mounted on: EOTech | STS; Leatherwood | AR-15/M16 Scope Mount) 
An excellent choice for professionals offers true two eyes open shooting for fast target acquisition.
atea.attachment.sight_eotech_hhs8.name: §5EOTech | HHS-Ⅷ Combo Sights
atea.attachment.sight_eotech_hhs8.desc:
EXPS3-0 Holographic Sight & G33 3x Magnifier 
(Mounted on: EOTech | STS) 
This ensemble is ideally suited for both Close-Quarters Combat and engaging distant targets.
atea.attachment.sight_eotech_hhs8_nozoom:
EXPS3-0 Holographic Sight & G33 3x Magnifier 
(Mounted on: EOTech | STS) 
An excellent choice for professionals offers true two eyes open shooting for fast target acquisition.
atea.attachment.sight_eotech_vudu_ffp_5t: §6EOTech | Vudu 5-25x50mm FFP Optical Sight (Mounted on: EOTech | PRS)

One of the shortest first focal plane rifle scopes on the market, 
that is ideal for short platform rifles,
It's up to 20 ounces lighter than other riflescopes in its class, 
giving you an advantage in the field or at the range.
atea.attachment.sight_nightforce_msatacr: §6Nightforce | Mil-Spec ATACR SU-294/VPS S-VPS 1-8x24mm F1 Optical Sight
§6Nightforce | Mil-Spec ATACR SU-393/PVS R-VPS 4-20x50mm F1 Optical Sight
§6Nightforce | Mil-Spec ATACR SU-296/PVS P-VPS 7-35x56mm F1 Optical Sight
atea.attachment.sight_okp7.name: §9OKP-7 Picatinny Reflex Sight
atea.attachment.sight_okp7.desc:
A classic and structurally simple Russian relfex sight, but the manufacturer is unknown. 
It is deeply rooted in people's hearts due to its unique construction.
atea.attachment.sight_phantom_xlrd310.de:
The field of view is much wider than that of ordinary sights 
and the structure is relatively simple.
atea.attachment.sight_sig_r8t_j6.name: §5SIG Sauer | Romeo-8T Reflex Sight & Juliet-6 Magnifier
atea.attachment.sight_sig_tdmr_5t30x56.d:
NULL
Mounted on: BO | COMM 1.93" & J-Arm & ACI
atea.attachment.sight_smtbd_cm2hp_10t60x: §6Schmidt & Bender | CMⅡ High Performance 10-60x56mm Optical Sight

The large field of view, together with the generous exit pupil, 
allows comfortable target acquisition and sets a new benchmark.
Mounted on: Spuhr | ISMS SP4804
atea.attachment.sight_te_mrpro3x30ir.des:
Originated from China, and going global. 
This type of sight has a very short lens length and high clarity, 
and the side bevel has a picatinny rail available.
Its outstandingly large objective lens does make machinegun operators have faster target acquisition and engagement.
atea.attachment.sight_vortex_ngswfc.name: §6Vortex - Sheltered Wings | XM157 NGSW-FC 1-8x30mm Complex Optical Sight
atea.attachment.sight_vortex_ngswfc.desc: Next Generation Squad Weapon - Fire Control
atea.attachment.sight_vortex_razorhdg3_1: §6Vortex | Razor HD Gen III 1-10x24mm FFP Optical Sight

A true 1x on the low end and daylight bright illumination for reliable performance in all conditions 
makes this a single solution for close-quarters and long-range. 
Mounted on: Geissele | Super Precision Short
atea.attachment.sight_vortex_razorhdg3_6: §6Vortex | Razor HD Gen III 6-36x56mm FFP Optical Sight

Built around the perfect balance of magnification and field of view, 
it delivers the resolution and contrast you need for long-range, tactical shooting. 
Mounted on: Reptilia | AUS & ROF
Added: Impact-4000 Laser Rangefinder

It has now been covered and the lever has been lowered to its minimum position. 
You can only aim with this poor reflective sight originally designed for pistols, don't you?
Mounted on: Reptilia | AUS & ROF
atea.attachment.sight_vortex_uh1_6m.name: §5Vortex | AMG UH-1 Gen2 Holographic Sight & Micro-6X Magnifier
atea.attachment.sight_vortex_venom_rd.de: Its super low mounting height makes it the perfect solution for handguns with cutout slides.
atea.attachment.sight_vortex_venom_rd_am:
Its super low mounting height makes it the perfect solution for handguns with cutout slides.
Also the mount gives a highly modular design which covers just about all mainstream red dots on the market.
Mounted on: Strike Industries | Ambush Offset
atea.attachment.sight_vortex_viper_rd.de:
A low-profile but large viewing window that makes for a wide field of view 
for rapid shooting transitions and target acquisition.
atea.attachment.sight_vortex_viper_rd_re:
A low-profile but large viewing window that makes for a wide field of view 
for rapid shooting transitions and target acquisition.
By the way, the Reflex Exoskeleton provides extreme protection for a wide variety of reflex optics.
Mounted on: Strike Industries | R.EX

A low-profile but large viewing window that makes for a wide field of view 
for rapid shooting transitions and target acquisition.
By the way, the Reflex Exoskeleton provides extreme protection for a wide variety of reflex optics.
Mounted on: Strike Industries | R.EX;
